creator: pronse@omel.es
text:
We are running Apache 2.0.45 (SysOp W2K Server SP4), with mod_ssl and 
mod_auth_ldap. We requiere client certificates, wich are validated through a 
LDAP Server.

After several time of normal working, the following error appear several times:

...
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:18 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:19 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 2268
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:22 2003] [notice] Child 2268: Child process is running
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:22 2003] [notice] Child 2268: Acquired the start mutex.
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:22 2003] [notice] Child 2268: Starting 100 worker threads.
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:50 2003] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 
3221225477 -- Restarting.
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:51 2003] [notice] Parent: Created child process 376
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:52 2003] [notice] Child 376: Child process is running
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:52 2003] [notice] Child 376: Acquired the start mutex.
[Thu Jul 10 11:06:52 2003] [notice] Child 376: Starting 100 worker threads.
...

As we are using the DEBUG version, we get the following information at the 
DrWatson log.

...
eax=00002f00 ebx=0000002f ecx=6fd1cb60 edx=00000001 esi=00000000 edi=00000000
eip=10220eb8 esp=022fbe8c ebp=022ffecc iopl=0         nv up ei pl nz na pe nc
cs=001b  ss=0023  ds=0023  es=0023  fs=0038  gs=0000             efl=00000202


función: strchr
        10220ea0 33c0             xor     eax,eax
        10220ea2 8a442408         mov     al,[esp+0x8]                 
ss:02b65d73=??
        10220ea6 53               push    ebx
        10220ea7 8bd8             mov     ebx,eax
        10220ea9 c1e008           shl     eax,0x8
        10220eac 8b542408         mov     edx,[esp+0x8]          
ss:02b65d73=????????
        10220eb0 f7c203000000     test    edx,0x3
        10220eb6 7413             jz      system+0x1db (102298cb)
ERROR -> 10220eb8 8a0a             mov     cl,[edx]                     
ds:00000001=??
        10220eba 42               inc     edx
        10220ebb 38d9             cmp     cl,bl
        10220ebd 74d1             jz      wspawnvpe+0x50 (10229390)
        10220ebf 84c9             test    cl,cl
        10220ec1 7451             jz      mbsnextc+0x44 (10230614)
        10220ec3 f7c203000000     test    edx,0x3
        10220ec9 75ed             jnz     wtol+0x8 (10221ab8)
        10220ecb 0bd8             or      ebx,eax
        10220ecd 57               push    edi
        10220ece 8bc3             mov     eax,ebx
        10220ed0 c1e310           shl     ebx,0x10

different
